item.title: Page Layouts
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Below is a list of 6 post/page layouts that come with the Genesis theme framework:
  • Content/Sidebar
  • Sidebar/Content
  • Content/Sidebar/Sidebar
  • Sidebar/Sidebar/Content
  • Sidebar/Content/Sidebar
  • Full Width Content

item.title: Sample Chat #1
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Brian: Can you believe that this theme is using post formats from WordPress? Tony: No, I can't - it's great. What's the name of it? Brian: It's called Mindstream, and you can purchase it over at StudioPress. Tony: I've been looking for a Tumblr-style theme, but have wanted to host it myself. Brian: I highly recommend that. Digital sharecropping stinks! Tony: Yeah, I hear ya. I read that on Copyblogger once.

item.title: Sample Quote #1
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
As you simplify your life, the laws of the universe will be simpler; solitude will not be solitude, poverty will not be poverty, nor weakness weakness.
~ Henry David Thoreau

item.title: Sample Quote #2
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Our goals can only be reached through a vehicle of a plan, in which we must fervently believe, and upon which we must vigorously act. There is no other route to success.
~ Pablo Picasso

item.title: Sample Quote #3
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Half the world is composed of people who have something to say and can’t, and the other half who have nothing to say and keep on saying it.
~ Robert Frost

item.title: Sample Aside #1
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: My name is Brian Gardner and I created this site. Call it a playground, of sorts, for my wandering mind to unravel itself into paragraph form. I love to write – in fact, I’ve always loved to write. When I was younger, it was an exit strategy. It was a way to let go of reality and enter a world that meant peace.
